content:
### Node enhancements

* [Google Sheets node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googlesheets/index.md): n8n now handles header names formatted as JSON paths.
* [Microsoft Dynamics CRM node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.microsoftdynamicscrm.md): add support for regions other than North America.
* [Telegram node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/index.md): add support for querying chat administrators.
